name: CreateUsersBatch
description:
Create a batch of users in the CRM system.

Use this tool to create multiple users at once in the HubSpot CRM. It should be called when there is a need to add multiple users efficiently through a single command.

parameters.name: users_batch_request
parameters.description: A JSON object containing an array of user objects to be created. Each user must include details such as associations, properties, and an optional objectWriteTraceId. Use for bulk user creation in HubSpot CRM.

associationCategory.description: The category of the association, such as "HUBSPOT_DEFINED".

associationTypeId.description: The ID representing the specific type of association.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

associationCategory.description: The category of the association, such as "HUBSPOT_DEFINED".

associationTypeId.description: The ID representing the specific type of association.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
